results.title: Attackers take hostages at Bangladesh restaurant

alphaDocs.snippet: Police exchanged gunfire with armed attackers Friday at a restaurant in a diplomatic zone of Dhaka, Bangladesh.
alphaDocs.source: NBC - KSBW - TV 8 - Salinas CA Consumer Watch/Money
alphaDocs.title: Gunmen battle police in diplomatic area of Dhaka, official says
alphaDocs.headline: Gunmen battle police in diplomatic area of Dhaka, official says

alphaDocs.snippet: (RNN) – Police are battling as many as eight gunmen who have taken dozens of hostages in an upscale area in a diplomatic zone in Dhaka, Bangladesh’s capital.
alphaDocs.author: RNN Staff
alphaDocs.title: Gunmen take hostages in Bangladesh's diplomatic area
alphaDocs.headline: Gunmen take hostages in Bangladesh's diplomatic area

alphaDocs.snippet: Armed attackers held as many as 20 hostages at a cafe in a diplomatic zone of Bangladesh's capital Friday.
alphaDocs.author: Farid Ahmed, Catherine E. Shoichet and Joe Sterling CNN
alphaDocs.source: ABC - KOCO 5 - Oklahoma City OK Entertainment, Columnists
alphaDocs.title: Dhaka shooting: Hostage situation as gunmen battle police
alphaDocs.headline: Dhaka shooting: Hostage situation as gunmen battle police

alphaDocs.snippet: DHAKA, Bangladesh—A group of as many as nine gunmen attacked a restaurant popular with foreigners in a diplomatic zone of the Bangladeshi capital Friday night, taking hostages and exchanging gunfire with security forces, according to a restaurant staff member and local media reports.
alphaDocs.source: Dow Jones Business News (via NASDAQ) Market Headlines
alphaDocs.title: Attackers Take Hostages at Bangladesh Restaurant
alphaDocs.headline: Attackers Take Hostages at Bangladesh Restaurant

alphaDocs.snippet: A fierce gunbattle broke out tonight between Bangladeshi security forces and unidentifed gunmen who stormed a popular restaurant in Dhaka's high-security Gulshan diplomatic area where several people, including foreigners, have been held hostage.
alphaDocs.title: Gunmen Storm Dhaka Restaurant, Take Hostages, One Killed
alphaDocs.headline: Gunmen Storm Dhaka Restaurant, Take Hostages, One Killed

alphaDocs.headline: The Latest: Tunisian town buries doctor killed in Istanbul

results.title: Tesla driver killed in crash while using car’s ‘Autopilot’

alphaDocs.snippet: WASHINGTON (AP) — A driver with a history of speeding who was so enamored of his Tesla Model S sedan that he nicknamed the car "Tessy" and praised the safety benefits of its sophisticated "Autopilot" system has become the first U.S. fatality in a wreck involving a car in self-driving mode.
alphaDocs.source: Ludington Daily News - Ludington MI Sports
alphaDocs.title: Death sparks 'Autopilot' car probe; man had speeding tickets
alphaDocs.headline: Death sparks 'Autopilot' car probe; man had speeding tickets

alphaDocs.snippet: WASHINGTON (AP) — The first person to die in a U.S. crash involving a car in self-driving mode was the tech-savvy 40-year-old owner of a Tesla Model S who nicknamed his car “Tessy” and praised its sophisticated “Autopilot” system.
alphaDocs.source: CBS - Eyewitness News 9 - Greenville NC Movies
alphaDocs.title: Tesla driver killed in crash while using car’s ‘Autopilot’
alphaDocs.headline: Tesla driver killed in crash while using car’s ‘Autopilot’

alphaDocs.snippet: WASHINGTON (AP) - The Latest on the first reported death of a motorist using self-driving technology (all times local):  Neighbors of an Ohio man killed while operating a self-driving car say he bought the Tesla Model S within the past year and loved showing it off.
alphaDocs.source: NBC - NBC 21 WFMJ - Youngstown OH News
alphaDocs.title: The Latest: Friends remember man dead in driverless crash
alphaDocs.headline: The Latest: Friends remember man dead in driverless crash

alphaDocs.snippet: By Amy Tennery                July 1 (Reuters) - A sleeping driver and a terrified granny are among the many people who appear in popular YouTube videos using the Tesla Autopilot technology - and not always using the system as intended.
alphaDocs.title: Sleeping driver, terrified granny among Tesla Autopilot users on YouTube
alphaDocs.headline: Sleeping driver, terrified granny among Tesla Autopilot users on YouTube

alphaDocs.title: Tesla driver killed in crash while using car’s ‘Autopilot’
alphaDocs.headline: Tesla driver killed in crash while using car’s ‘Autopilot’

results.title: UK shelves balanced budget goal as Brexit vote roils economy

alphaDocs.snippet: LONDON (AP) — Britain's Treasury chief on Friday abandoned the government's long-held goal of balancing the nation's books by 2020, warning that the country's vote to leave the European Union had sent shock waves and instability through the U.K. economy.
alphaDocs.author: JILL LAWLESS
alphaDocs.title: UK shelves balanced budget goal as Brexit vote roils economy
alphaDocs.headline: UK shelves balanced budget goal as Brexit vote roils economy

alphaDocs.snippet: LONDON (AP) — Justice Secretary Michael Gove argued Friday that he should be Britain's next leader because he is passionately committed to leaving the European Union — but said he would not trigger EU exit talks this year if he becomes prime minister.
alphaDocs.source: Beloit Daily News - Beloit WI Business
alphaDocs.title: British PM hopeful Gove says no EU exit talks this year
alphaDocs.headline: British PM hopeful Gove says no EU exit talks this year

alphaDocs.snippet: LONDON (AP) — Political healing after Britain's vote to leave the European Union seemed a distant prospect Friday, as Justice Secretary Michael Gove ramped up his Conservative leadership bid, and a senior colleague called for him to step aside.
alphaDocs.source: Beloit Daily News - Beloit WI Business
alphaDocs.title: Justice Secretary Gove to spell out post-Brexit plans
alphaDocs.headline: Justice Secretary Gove to spell out post-Brexit plans

alphaDocs.headline: 'I wouldn’t do it again,' says Loretta Lynch after Bill Clinton meeting – video

alphaDocs.headline: Loretta Lynch: "I fully expect to accept" recommendations in Clinton case

alphaDocs.snippet: Attorney General Loretta Lynch will accept the "determinations and findings" of the FBI and career prosecutors who are investigating Hillary Clinton's use of a private email server while she was secretary of state, a Justice Department official said Friday.

alphaDocs.snippet: Austria could go from having a left-leaning president-elect to a far-right one in a matter of months, as a court has annulled the results of the country's May election and ordered another one be held.
alphaDocs.author: Atika Shubert and Angela Dewan CNN
alphaDocs.title: Austria must redo presidential election
alphaDocs.headline: Austria must redo presidential election

alphaDocs.snippet: VIENNA (AP) — Austria’s highest court on Friday overturned the results of the country’s presidential election and ordered a rerun, following claims of counting irregularities by the right-wing candidate who narrowly lost.

alphaDocs.headline: Austria court overturns presidential elections, calls rerun

alphaDocs.snippet: JACKSON — A federal judge blocked a Mississippi law on religious objections to same-sex marriage moments before it was set to take effect Friday, ruling it unconstitutionally establishes preferred beliefs and creates unequal treatment for gay people.
alphaDocs.source: Houma Today - Houma LA Local News
alphaDocs.title: Judge blocks Mississippi's 'religious objections' law
alphaDocs.headline: Judge blocks Mississippi's 'religious objections' law
